h2.a: Superintendent's Most Recent Message RE: COVID-19
Click here for COVID-19 DISTRICT INFORMATION

a.img: Due to the COVID-19 outbreak and its possible impact on our community, all Logan Township School District's schools will remain closed as long as the Governor's Executive Order stays in effect.

h2.a: Click Here for Remote Learning Resources

img.alt: The 10 biggest losers in N.J. school funding plan.

a.img: BOARD PRESIDENT FRANK DONNELLY HONORED FOR HIS MANY YEARS OF COMMUNITY SERVICE

p.a: Click to read the New Jersey School Boards Association article honoring Frank Donnelly

td.br: The Logan Township Board of Education has cancelled the Work Session on April 22, 2020. The Work Session has been rescheduled as a virtual meeting to be held on April 29, 2020 at 7:00PM followed immediately by the Regular meeting. The Public Hearing on the Budget will be at the beginning of the Regular meeting. For virtual meeting instructions, please check back here no later than 6:30pm the evening of the meeting. Action will be taken.

td.a: Apply for Free and Reduced Meals-Click for more info

img.br: The Logan Township School District realizes that families' financial situations may have changed during this difficult time. We encourage anyone affected to consider completing an online application for Free and Reduced Meals. Students that qualify for Free or Reduced Meals continue to receive breakfast and lunch on a weekly basis during the school closure.

td.a: GET CONNECTED! Find low-cost Internet and affordable computers in your area! Visit everyoneon.org and enter your zip code.
